title: 追梦赤子心
author: GALA
lrc:
[00:15.330]充满鲜花的世界到底在哪里 
[00:21.310]如果它真的存在那么我一定会去 
[00:28.760]我想在那里最高的山峰矗立 
[00:34.180]不在乎它是不是悬崖峭壁
[00:38.870]
[00:42.010]用力活着用力爱哪怕肝脑涂地 
[00:47.830]不求任何人满意只要对得起自己 
[00:55.200]关于理想我从来没选择放弃
[01:00.660]即使在灰头土脸的日子里 
[01:06.440]
[01:07.390]也许我没有天分
[01:10.600]但我有梦的天真
[01:13.900]我将会去证明用我的一生
[01:20.640]也许我手比较笨 
[01:23.850]但我愿不停探寻 
[01:27.260]付出所有的青春不留遗憾 
[01:32.690]
[01:34.610]向前跑 迎着冷眼和嘲笑 
[01:40.160]生命的广阔不历经磨难怎能感到 
[01:47.130]命运它无法让我们跪地求饶 
[01:54.710]就算鲜血洒满了怀抱 
[01:59.620]
[02:00.980]继续跑 带着赤子的骄傲 
[02:07.690]生命的闪耀不坚持到底怎能看到 
[02:14.020]与其苟延残喘不如纵情燃烧吧 
[02:22.460]有一天会再发芽
[02:29.330]
[02:56.260]未来迷人绚烂总在向我召唤 
[03:01.180]哪怕只有痛苦作伴也要勇往直前 
[03:09.070]我想在那里最蓝的大海扬帆 
[03:14.780]绝不管自己能不能回还 
[03:20.220]
[03:21.890]失败后郁郁寡欢 
[03:24.760]那是懦夫的表现 
[03:28.190]只要一息尚存请握紧双拳 
[03:35.010]在天色破晓之前 
[03:38.170]我们要更加勇敢 
[03:41.640]等待日出时最耀眼的瞬间 
[03:46.970]
[03:49.270]向前跑 迎着冷眼和嘲笑 
[03:55.600]生命的广阔不历经磨难怎能感到 
[04:02.610]命运它无法让我们跪地求饶 
[04:09.530]就算鲜血洒满了怀抱
[04:13.940]
[04:16.110]继续跑 带着赤子的骄傲 
[04:22.720]生命的闪耀不坚持到底怎能看到 
[04:29.170]与其苟延残喘不如纵情燃烧 
[04:36.970]为了心中的美好 
[04:43.980]不妥协直到变老 
[04:50.460]

title: 平凡之路
author: 朴树
lrc:
[00:11.850]徘徊着的 在路上的
[00:17.390]你要走吗 via via
[00:22.580]易碎的 骄傲着
[00:28.740]那也曾是我的模样
[00:34.500]沸腾着的 不安着的
[00:40.140]你要去哪 via via
[00:45.880]谜一样的 沉默着的
[00:51.030]故事你真的 在听吗
[00:55.910]我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
[01:01.390]我曾经拥有着的一切 转眼都飘散如烟
[01:07.040]我曾经失落失望 失掉所有方向
[01:13.250]直到看见平凡 才是唯一的答案
[01:31.640]当你仍然 还在幻想
[01:37.120]你的明天 via via
[01:42.710]她会好吗 还是更烂
[01:48.540]对我而言 是另一天
[01:52.780]我曾经毁了我的一切 只想永远地离开
[01:58.230]我曾经堕入无边黑暗 想挣扎无法自拔
[02:04.160]我曾经像你像他 像那野草野花
[02:09.990]绝望着 也渴望着 也哭也笑平凡着
[03:02.420]向前走 就想走 就算你被给过什么
[03:07.810]向前走 就想走 就算你被夺走什么
[03:13.550]向前走 就想走 就算你会错过什么
[03:19.250]向前走 就想走 就算你会
[03:23.890]我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
[03:29.210]我曾经拥有着的一切 转眼都飘散如烟
[03:34.940]我曾经失落失望 失掉所有方向
[03:41.040]直到看见平凡 才是唯一的答案
[03:46.420]我曾经毁了我的一切 只想永远地离开
[03:51.970]我曾经堕入无边黑暗 想挣扎无法自拔
[03:57.850]我曾经像你像他 像那野草野花
[04:03.400]绝望着 也渴望着 也哭也笑平凡着
[04:09.120]我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
[04:14.680]我曾经问遍整个世界 从来没得到答案
[04:20.410]我不过像你像他 像那野草野花
[04:26.210]冥冥中 这是我 唯一要走的路啊
[04:33.540]时间无言 如此这般 明天已在 Hia Hia
[04:44.730]风吹过的 路依然远 你的故事讲到了哪
[04:56.550]
[04:57.550]Arragement : 朴树

title: It Is Well
author: Bethel Music
lrc:
[00:00.00]It Is Well
[00:13.57]Grander earth has quaked before
[00:20.50]Moved by the sound of His voice
[00:26.35]Seas that are shaken and stirred
[00:32.52]Can be calmed and broken for my regard
[00:38.83]Through it all, through it all
[00:42.44]My eyes are on You
[00:46.01]Through it all, through it all
[00:48.94]It is well
[00:53.58]Through it all, through it all
[00:57.21]My eyes are on You
[01:00.59]It is well with me
[01:17.75]Far be it from me to not believe
[01:25.00]Even when my eyes can't see
[01:30.59]And this mountain that's in front of me
[01:37.05]Will be thrown into the midst of the sea
[01:43.45]Through it all, through it all
[01:47.13]My eyes are on You
[01:50.66]Through it all, through it all
[01:53.48]It is well
[01:58.20]Through it all, through it all
[02:01.88]My eyes are on You
[02:05.41]It is well
[02:08.99]It is well
[02:12.41]So let go my soul and trust in Him
[02:19.76]The waves and wind still know His name
[02:27.23]So let go my soul and trust in Him
[02:34.56]The waves and wind still know His name
[02:41.95]So let go my soul and trust in Him
[02:49.41]The waves and wind still know His name
[02:56.79]The waves and wind still know His name
[03:07.12]It is well with my soul
[03:21.86]It is well with my soul
[03:36.55]It is well with my soul
[03:51.40]It is well it is well with my soul
[04:06.30]It is well it is well with my soul
[04:20.82]It is well with my soul
[04:35.49]It is well with my soul
[04:50.26]It is well it is well with my soul
[05:05.41]It is well it is well with my soul
[05:20.01]It is well it is well with my soul
[05:41.58]Through it all, through it all
[05:45.46]My eyes are on You
[05:48.89]Through it all, through it all
[05:52.22]It is well
[05:56.48]Through it all, through it all
[06:00.31]My eyes are on You
[06:03.43]It is well with me

title: 一生所爱
author: 卢冠廷
lrc:
[00:00.00]一生所爱
[00:02.00]大话西游主题曲
[00:04.00]
[00:06.00]演唱：卢冠廷
[00:08.00]
[00:10.00]分享：董先森
[00:36.40]从前现在过去了再不来
[00:45.61]红红落叶长埋尘土内
[00:53.57]开始终结总是没变改
[01:02.81]天边的你飘泊白云外
[01:12.95]苦海翻起爱浪
[01:21.63]在世间难逃避命运
[01:31.22]相亲竟不可接近
[01:40.31]或我应该相信是缘份
[02:26.64]情人别后永远再不来(消散的情缘)
[02:36.27]无言独坐放眼尘世外(愿来日再续)
[02:44.05]鲜花虽会凋谢(只愿)但会再开(为你)
[02:53.03]一生所爱隐约(守候)在白云外(期待)
[03:03.34]苦海翻起爱浪
[03:11.90]在世间难逃避命运
[03:21.68]相亲竟不可接近
[03:30.83]或我应该相信是缘份
[03:40.09]苦海翻起爱浪
[03:47.49]在世间难逃避命运
[03:58.64]相亲竟不可接近
[04:07.65]或我应该相信是缘份

title: I Do
lrc:
[00:00.00]I Do
[00:12.170]My whole world changed
[00:14.680]from the moment I met you
[00:18.330]and it would never be the same
[00:22.710]felt like I knew that I'd always loved you
[00:28.100]from the moment I heard your name
[00:31.830]
[00:32.390]everything was perfect
[00:35.080]I knew this love was worth it
[00:37.480]our own miracle in the making
[00:42.690]until this world stops turning
[00:45.020]I'll still be here waiting and waiting
[00:48.530]to make that vow that I'll
[00:51.940]
[00:52.070]I'll be by your side till the day I die
[00:57.210]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[01:01.970]something old, something new
[01:04.410]something borrowed, something blue
[01:07.050]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[01:11.810]

[01:15.160]ya tears have all dried out
[01:18.070]cause I won't see you cry again
[01:21.930]throw pennies in a fountain
[01:25.040]look at what comes out
[01:28.030]sometimes wishes do come true
[01:31.830]
[01:32.590]now everything is perfect
[01:35.050]I know this love is worth it
[01:37.500]our own miracle in the making
[01:42.610]until this world stops turning
[01:45.050]I'll still be here waiting and waiting
[01:48.470]to make that vow that I'll
[01:51.670]
[01:52.220]I'll be by your side till the day I die
[01:57.200]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[02:01.920]something old, something new
[02:04.410]something borrowed, something blue
[02:07.040]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[02:11.740]
[02:12.340]always better than worse
[02:14.550]protect you from the hurt
[02:17.010]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[02:22.260]I do love you, yes I do love you
[02:26.940]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[02:33.180]cause I love you, love you
[02:37.590]
[02:42.240]I'll be by your side till the day I die
[02:47.070]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[02:51.870]something old, something new
[02:54.410]something borrowed, something blue
[02:56.980]I'll be waiting till I hear you say I do
[03:01.560]
[03:02.630]we're shining like a diamond
[03:05.000]just look at us now
[03:08.030]I wanna hear you say I do

title: 篝火旁
author: 吕大叶&Broma Three
lrc:
[00:00.00]篝火旁
[00:20.25]你还坐在小时候的篝火旁
[00:22.98]看天上的月亮
[00:24.37]还是那个模样
[00:25.73]北斗星在指着你的前方
[00:28.06]在夜里你也不会失去你的方向
[00:30.65]不会再度感到迷茫
[00:32.90]湖面倒映着天空是你心中的梦想
[00:35.63]丢弃内心不安的仿徨
[00:38.52]不会在任何寂静夜里孤单幻想流浪
[00:41.21]你说你想不起曾经梦境里面想要的对话
[00:43.65]你说你看不见星星在天空点亮你的童话
[00:46.15]一转眼斗转星移
[00:47.15]在漆黑的夜里砍断了荆棘
[00:48.79]你听见声音在讨论你的
[00:49.79]曾经想要走过去澄清
[00:51.32]冲破水泥钢筋不让
[00:52.00]谁用嘲笑压迫神经
[00:53.86]哪怕他在咆哮故事再搞笑不要无理取闹
[00:56.50]给失败画上个句号再向敌人提出个警告
[00:58.49]在天黑前证明你行松开紧绷的神经 去聆听
[01:01.37]当镜子里的眼神早已不再天真学会了深沉
[01:04.16]很多回忆 内心深处 最不为人知的秘密
[01:06.55]曾经自己无知地以为欺骗了自己
[01:07.55]就能欺骗了全世界
[01:09.29]到现在才发现 其实那只是 无知地 在发泄
[01:11.78]忘记了天空的模样
[01:12.78]骗自己不会觉得彷徨开始无理的张狂
[01:15.22]抛弃了形象 丢弃了理想
[01:16.22]不再背着皮包 去流浪
[01:17.90]去追逐梦想 奋力的奔跑 仿佛回到
[01:19.60]童年操场上 挥洒汗水的跑道 滋味你知道
[01:22.04]看见了时间在自己身边一点点的流逝
[01:24.58]开始慌了发现自己的好运气都用光了
[01:27.07]开始低下了头不再张扬
[01:28.07]尝试着探索真理的流向
[01:29.51]相信最终会抵达成功的太平洋
[01:31.20]不再在四处流浪
[01:32.05]内心深处的旗帜会在天空飘扬
[01:34.20]驾一艘船去扬帆起航
[01:35.18]太阳的指向那是你前进的方向
[01:37.48]它让你不再仿徨给你希望的光亮
[01:39.30]做自己榜样
[01:40.36]抓住时机下一班飞机跟自己说句后会有期
[01:42.75]你还坐在小时候的篝火旁
[01:45.55]看天上的月亮
[01:47.19]还是那个模样
[01:48.19]北斗星在指着你的前方
[01:50.47]在夜里你也不会失去你的方向
[01:53.27]不会再度感到迷茫
[01:55.36]湖面倒映着天空是你心中的梦想
[01:58.30]丢弃内心不安的仿徨
[02:01.04]不会在任何寂静夜里孤单幻想流浪
[02:03.77]try many times 4 the fight of life
[02:04.92]this rap **** is just like the dice
[02:06.06]Open your eyes in the last light
[02:07.16]prepare your rhyme for the last fight
[02:08.50]Gamble it all with your last dime
[02:10.31]raise your head homie never cry
[02:11.60]so many people gonna
[02:12.60]mention my name
[02:13.06]I'm heading toward to my dream
[02:14.00]we homies like a team
[02:14.25]I spit the rap **** underground
[02:15.25]By grace I've risen to the top
[02:19.61]I've bounced No body knows the untold
[02:20.81]u try 2 break the chains step on the train
[02:21.72]2 dream inside screaming u
[02:22.72]try 2stop shaking
[02:23.77]no more faking,it's dream，you'll make it
[02:25.01]在夜里 讲着真心话 从不怕
[02:26.01]别人说你眼神的变化
[02:27.95]带着家人温馨的牵挂 让冰雪融化
[02:29.79]去见证童话 不会再说一次空话
[02:31.73]睁开黑色的双眼 忘掉了所有嘲笑
[02:32.73]点起了一颗香烟
[02:34.71]把不堪回忆的往事 全都烧掉
[02:36.96]松开紧绷的神经 抛下狼狈的神情
[02:37.96]想你的曾经 陪你的身影
[02:39.65]记住火热的体温 赌上你最张扬的青春
[02:42.70]你的固执让你的目标精准 付出英勇的精神
[02:45.32]打开了陌生的大门 别怕
[02:47.32]就算黑暗吞噬了最后一丝光线
[02:48.81]我依旧还在捍卫我们的明天
[02:50.45]用歌声记录 这场梦想的战役 多么的深远
[02:53.05]被第一缕的曙光
[02:53.40]拉出了无底的深渊 你不再困倦
[02:55.54]未来的道路荒凉 也要抓着故乡的泥土
[02:58.37]不忘初心 想象着跟当初的自己见面
[03:00.66]告诉自己 坚持信念不变 梦想终会实现
[03:03.11]不会再度彷徨
[03:03.50]你一直坐在那个曾经的篝火旁
[03:06.04]你还坐在小时候的篝火旁
[03:08.77]看天上的月亮
[03:10.23]还是那个模样
[03:11.32]北斗星在指着你的前方
[03:13.71]在夜里你也不会失去你的方向
[03:16.40]不会再度感到迷茫
[03:18.40]湖面倒映着天空是你心中的梦想
[03:21.48]丢弃内心不安的仿徨
[03:24.28]不会在任何寂静夜里孤单幻想流浪
